product_name: Fizik Antares Versus X K:ium Saddle - Men's
long_description: Lightly padded with a deep center channel for comfort, the 240g Fizik Antares Versus X K:ium Bike Saddle offers a high-performance saddle to cyclists having a moderate range of flexibility. Antares Versus X K:ium is designed to offer support for those with moderate flexibility-when bent over, one's hands hang midway down shins, not touching toes. Synthetic Microtex cover is durable, water resistant and washable, and will not fade; plus, it's lighter than leather. Central channel spans the length of the saddle to offer a relief zone for sensitive tissues. Double-injected foam offers light padding for long days in the saddle. Nylon/carbon-reinforced shell provides lightweight support and comfort. K:ium alloy rails offer an excellent strength-to-weight ratio and comfort-enhancing vibration damping.
short_description: Lightly padded with a deep center channel for comfort, the 240g Fizik Antares Versus X K:ium Bike Saddle offers a high-performance saddle to cyclists having a moderate range of flexibility.
